en2: I accidentally abraded my knee when I fell off my bike.
I noticed an abnormal pattern in the data that needed further investigation.
I observed how the laser ablates the surface of the metal during the experiment.
I always abide by the rules at my workplace.
I felt a sharp pain in my abdomen after eating too much.
I support efforts to abolish outdated laws that no longer serve the public.
I waited for the storm to abate before leaving the house.
I had to abandon my plans due to unforeseen circumstances.
I have allergies whenever I breathe in too much pollen in spring.
I dropped the ball and it fell to the ground because of gravity.
I decided to study entomology because I've always been fascinated by insects.
I shook the box and heard something rattle inside.
I always shake the bottle before using it.
I love watching the cherry trees blossom in spring.
